name: Lapse of University of Hawaii appropriations
text:
Upon the lapse of an appropriation to the University of Hawaii, moneys which remain unencumbered shall be returned to the state treasury within ninety days. [L 1986, c 321, §2]
Note
  Repeal on June 30, 1998 extended to June 30, 2006.  L 1986, c 321, §12; L 1987, c 283, §69; L 1989, c 371, §7; L 1991, c 163, §3; L 1993, c 314, §2; L Sp 1993, c 8, §22; L 1997, c 180, §1; L 1998, c 115, §24; L 2005, c 137, §1.
